Articles.Content:
I'm designing a couple of SSTOs and I'm testing them with different fuel levels for re-entry, to see if they are stable, but it is a hard thing to test, I remember installing Ferram Aerospace Research and it had a cool assistant that displayed some useful aerodynamic coefficients.

What I'm looking for is a similar mod but for the stock aero model, I did a couple of google searches but couldn't find much.
The question about add-ons has been moved to add-on discussion.
Check out Correct CoL or Kerbal Wind Tunnel. They'll give you new graphs within SPH.
